reviews.review: fuck this game i recommend it
Много читеров, но игра сама по себе отличная

Игра мне понравилась. Разнообразил игру тактиками и фишками в каждом раунде. Игра с друзьями, выход операций, все это мне понравилось.
Но мне не понравилось наличие читеров в играх без прайм акаунта - это минус и очень большой.
Могу посоветовать эту игру, так как тут можно очень интересно провести время с друзьями!
fun game to play with friends, or just by yourself.

The honest truth... At first you just see any average FPS. Pretty good fun to play with mates and stuff around. However there is a more advanced side that requires mastering the game mechanics and game sense. Some of which you don't even know or learn about until a good few hundred hours into the game. That's the difference between silver and other ranks I suppose. Which speaking of the ranking system. Whatever modified gleko 2 system thing they claim to use has to be the most broken thing ever. It does not work, not even in the slightest. If you want to climb ranks, don't even bother with solo que. Half the time you'll get trolls and the other have just bad team mates, with the occasional good game here and there. It's not until you're past silver that soloing actually works because people are generally trying to climb too. Anyway slightly off track, but the general gist. Good game for casually playing or if you want to take it more seriously there's the opportunity. Just would recommend staying away form competitive matches unless you've got a crew. HF & GL

This game is great.  Being stuck in silver 1 for 2 years I can say that the competitve aspect is the best part.  Once you get into silver 2 you will think you are a god and then in one week get de-ranked back to silver 1.  Stick to arms race if you don't want to feel like you are absolute garbage.  Also if you're bad people are going to bully you.

9/10
